name: lil-gui

0.3.0.name: lil-gui
0.3.0.description: Makes a floating panel for controllers on the web. API largely compatible with [dat.gui](https://github.com/dataarts/dat.gui).

scripts.build: npm run icons && npm run sass && npm run rollup
scripts.dev: npm run build && node -r esm scripts/watch.js
